name: Xpyre, Grocery Expiration Management - iOS App
description: Built a mobile app to manage grocery expiration dates, using Swift and UIKit. Practiced responsive UI with UITableView and applied OOP for scalable inventory management. Tested expiration logic for reliability across sessions.

name: Audio Processing for Tinnitus - Full-Stack Website
description: Created a web tool for tailored audio therapy using Express.js and Firebase. Enabled real-time streaming with notch filters and documented APIs for long-term scalability and teammate support.

name: Skincare Education - Full-Stack Website
description: Engineered a Node.js reverse proxy to enable Azure OAuth login. Used MongoDB for fast data handling, leading to 50% faster load times. Led a 4-person team using Git across development sprints.

name: Twitter Topic ML Modeling
description: Cleaned tweet data using NLTK and applied matrix factorization to model consumer sentiment across 100k+ tweets. Visualized and ranked 500+ themes using NumPy and pandas.

name: Proposed Drone Fleet Management System - Project Management
description: Led an Agile development cycle for a drone system to monitor windmills. Created architecture, wireframes, and backlog. Focused on reducing maintenance downtime and improving stakeholder usability.

name: Seam Carving - Dijkstra’s Algorithm
description: Implemented Dijkstra’s Algorithm to perform seam carving for image compression. Optimized traversal logic for performance. Maintained code quality and version accuracy with Git.

name: Gender Pay Gap - Data Analysis
description: Used R and ggplot2 to analyze and visualize gender pay disparities. Shared insights with 100+ students. Ensured statistical confidence and persuasive data storytelling.
